summary.para: Determines whether the current application host environment is in the desktop or immersive mode.

param.name: pahe
param.para: A pointer to a AHE_TYPE value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one of the following values to indicate the current host environment.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a single method that enables an application to determine whether its host is in desktop or immersive mode.

remarks.para: An application must implement this interface together with the DelegateExecute handler ().
